name: Floor & Decor Holdings, Inc.
description: Floor & Decor Holdings, Inc. is a leading specialty retailer of hard surface flooring, offering a wide variety of products for both residential and commercial projects. Founded in 2000 and headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, the company operates a chain of warehouse-format stores that provide an extensive selection of flooring, including tile, wood, laminate, and natural stone products, as well as related tools and accessories. Floor & Decor's unique business model combines an attractive in-store shopping experience with robust online capabilities, allowing customers to browse and purchase products conveniently. The company caters to both DIY customers and professional contractors, establishing a reputation for quality products at competitive prices. Floor & Decor is committed to providing exceptional customer service and an extensive product assortment, making it a go-to destination for flooring solutions. With its continual expansion and focus on innovative merchandising, Floor & Decor aims to capture a larger share of the growing hard surface flooring market, driven by trends in home improvement and commercial construction.

seo.meta_title: Floor & Decor Holdings, Inc. | Hard Surface Flooring Retailer
seo.meta_description: Explore Floor & Decor, a leading retailer specializing in hard surface flooring solutions. Discover a wide range of products for your home improvement and commercial needs.

faq.question: What products does Floor & Decor offer?
faq.answer: Floor & Decor offers a wide range of hard surface flooring products including tile, wood, laminate, and natural stone, as well as tools and accessories.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Floor & Decor?
faq.answer: Tom Taylor is the CEO of Floor & Decor Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Floor & Decor headquartered?
faq.answer: Floor & Decor is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, USA.
